    Sends command to get the assets of an organisational unit Returns unit assets If an error string was sent instead, throw the error
    float NetworkDataSource.getCredits​(java.lang.String unitName)
    Sends command to get the credits of an organisational unit Returns unit credits If an error string was sent instead, throw the error

    Retrieve the asset from the database given an Asset object
    OrganisationalUnit NetworkDataSource.retrieveOrgUnit​(java.lang.String unitName)
    Send a command through the network to retrieve a queried organisational unit in the database given the unit name
    User NetworkDataSource.retrieveUser​(java.lang.String username)
    Sends command for server to get user Returns queried user If an error string was sent instead, throw the error
